title: Humanity’s Great Sage - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Battle Competition   Beast Companions   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Pill Based Cultivation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sect Development   Slow Romance   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Momo   莫默
description:
The weak scream till hoarse without anyone who cares.

The strong soft whisper with words deeply rooted in the hearts of the people.

A burning skill tree, each leaf carrying a different spirit pattern. With his sect destroyed, Lu Ye, who was reduced to a mining slave, became a cultivator. He soon started to stir up the land of Kyushu.>
